bachelor_degree: Bachelor of Engineering (BEng) in Systems Engineering
home_description: I'm a Software Developer resident in Ecuador and a tech industry lover. My main focus is to create applications that can help to solve real problems and make people's lives easier.
about_description: Systems Engineer with training focus on software development, databases and software testing. I have experience in the development, maintenance and testing of web applications. I have great collaborative and self-management capacity with experience in agile teams.
portfolio_description: This is my personal portafolio, where you can find information about me and my projects.
